priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Tumor Response Assessment Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C96781

self.title: CDISC SDTM Tumor Response Assessment Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology for oncology studies relevant to the test names that describe an assessment of response to treatment or therapy within the disease response and clinical classification domain.
name: Oncology Response Assessment Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Tumor Response Assessment Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: An assessment of the most clinically favorable overall response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the clinical response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the cytogenetic response of the disease to the therapy.
An indication as to whether disease recurrence occurred.
An assessment of the hematologic response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the metabolic response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the minimal residual disease response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the molecular response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the morphologic response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the equivocality of disease progression based on a newly identified lesion.
An assessment of the response of a non-target tumor(s) to the therapy.
An assessment of the overall response of the disease to the therapy. (NCI)
An assessment of the pathologic response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the radiologic response of the disease to the therapy.
A global deterioration of health status providing evidence of disease progression not covered by disease response criteria (eg. RECIST).
An assessment of the response of a target tumor(s) to the therapy.
An assessment of the change in tumor antigen quantity in response to the therapy.
